mapper.select: SELECT sd.sensorFieldName, sd.valueNum, sd.valueStr, sd.updateTime FROM (SELECT n.n_name AS sensorFieldName, sd.value_num AS valueNum, sd.value_str AS valueStr, sd.update_time AS updateTime FROM t_sensor_data sd JOIN t_sensor_fields n ON sd.field_id = n.nid WHERE sd.device_id = #{deviceId} AND (n.n_name, sd.update_time) IN ( SELECT n.n_name, MAX(sd.update_time) FROM t_sensor_data sd JOIN t_sensor_fields n ON sd.field_id = n.nid WHERE sd.device_id = #{deviceId} GROUP BY n.n_name )) AS sd;

SELECT sf.n_description AS sensorName, sf.nid AS sensorId, sd.value_num AS valueNum, sd.value_str AS valueStr, sd.update_time AS updateTime FROM t_sensor_data sd JOIN t_sensor_fields sf ON sd.field_id = sf.nid WHERE sd.device_id = #{deviceId} AND sd.field_id = #{sensorId} AND sf.is_deleted=0 ORDER BY sd.field_id, sd.update_time DESC
